name: The Paper
description: Race against the clock as more and more papers arrive. Try to last as many days as possible while still being able to sleep each night, and get the next days deliveries. Watch out for the hidden hazards that can destroy your paper! If you are wondering about the loud music, I am tone deaf and decided to use a NN to create the music for me. Thats the best piece it could come up with. Feel free to mute it.
